```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(fImport)
library(forecast)
library(tidyverse)
library(magrittr)
library(highcharter)
```


## Real Estate Prices

```{r real estate outlook}
fredSeries("ATNHPIUS39340Q", from = "1984-01-01") %>% 
  forecast(h = 8) %>% 
  hchart()
```

## Provo-Orem Employment  

```{r labor market}
fredSeries("PROV349NA", from = "1990-01-01") %>% 
  forecast(h = 24) %>% 
  hchart()
```  

## Retail Sales

```{r retail sales}
fredSeries("RSAFSNA", from = "1992-01-01") %>%
  divide_by(1000) %>% 
  forecast(h = 24) %>% 
  hchart()
```
